ygData.subject: Re: Re: Mitty the Kitty
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, I Killed here 56 times to get all 3 rings, I dont think I ever used less than 4 wraths.
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, I Killed here 56 times to get all 3 rings, I dont think I ever
used less than 4 wraths.



On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Martyn Adams wrote:

> From: Martyn Adams <martyn-adams@...>
>
>
> Renmorum Lifespinner wrote:
> >
> > From: "Renmorum Lifespinner" <renmorum@...>
> >
> > Well, on the Karana server she was definitely green to me at L30. She also
> > went down with two Wraths.
>
> She is green to me at lvl 31 and I've never managed to down her in less
> than four wraths so I don't really believe that she goes down in two
> wraths.. (and that is without her being healed since I cleared out all
> the other kitty's that heal her).
>
> Vinamin
> Son of Innoruuk
> Priest of The Lady
> Erollisi Marr
>
> >
